document.heading: Non-Resident Taxi Drivers Registration Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-130, the “Non-Resident Taxi Drivers Registration Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-113 which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 11, 2007, and January 8, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 1, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-281 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-130 became effective on March 26, 2008.
